Plot: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.
Title: The Girl Next Door
Writer: David Wagner (story), Brent Goldberg (story), Stuart Blumberg (screenplay), David Wagner (screenplay), Brent Goldberg (screenplay)
Actors: Emile Hirsch, Elisha Cuthbert, Timothy Olyphant, James Remar
tomatoConsensus: The movie borrows heavily from Risky Business, though Hirsch and Cuthbert are appealing leads.
